name: ExBot
description:
Unity crashed and i lost some progress and I didnt have enough time to fixed it :(

The games not too fun but I enjoy making it and learnt some new stuff

WASD to move, SPACE to jump, Q to drop organ, left click to shoot

inspired by miziziziz's game

Music - Helios by Lexica
